properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 9:03AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County
Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties
Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties
Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Hinds and Warren Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Big Black River Near Bentonia.
* until further notice.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 31.2 feet.
* Major flooding is occurring and Major flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 31.5 feet
Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 29.0 feet...Agricultural land along the river is
devastated by flood waters.
* Impact...At 28.0 feet...Devastating flooding of agricultural land
begins to occur.
* Impact...At 26.5 feet...Flooding of agricultural land has more than
doubled in the last 1.5 feet rise.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet...Extensive flooding of agricultural land is
occurring.
* Impact...At 23.5 feet...Agricultural land near the river begins to
flood.
* Impact...At 22.0 feet...Low lying woodland areas along the river
begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
